text: wqal fireawn mkdhdhibana lmwsa fi dewth 'iilaa al'iqrar birabi alealamin waltslym lh: ya haman abn li bnana' ezymana; laealiy 'ablugh 'abwab alsamawat wama ywslny 'ilyha, fanzr 'iilaa 'ilh musaa bnfsy, wa'iiniy lazn musaa kadhbana fi dewah 'ana lana rbana, wa'anah fawq alsmawat, whkdha zuyan lifireawn eamalih alsyiy farah hsnana, wsudd ean sabil alhq; bsbb albatil aldhy zuyin lh, wama aihtial fireawn wtdbyrh l'iyham alnaas 'anah mhq, wamusaa mbtl 'illa fi khsar wbwar, la yfydh 'iilaa alshqa' fi aldunya walakhrt
